head.supplied: 18/6/68 ¶ Dear Dr Ellery, ¶ ¶ The Vice President of the Geographical Society of Paris, Mons. Cortambert, has recently written to me ¶ with a wish of bringing that Society and the R.S. of Vict. in di...

div.p: MS 11663 Royal Society of Victoria records, box 2/2, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.

The Vice President of the Geographical Society of Paris, Mons. Cortambert, has recently written to me
Letter not found. with a wish of bringing that Society and the R.S. of Vict. in direct communication, especially with a view, that transactions may be exchanged. If not already such a communication is initiated, please bring the request before the Council.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd von Mueller
MS annotation presumably by Ellery: 'Dated 18 June | Recd 6 July | Ansd 6 July 1868 '. Letter not found.
